name: Extra Spicy Hummus

ingredients.notes: Soaked overnight with baking soda, cooked in Instant Pot for 15 min with natural release
Deseeded and chopped, or substitute with 1/2 tsp red pepper flakes
Use to thin the hummus while blending

instructions: Add soaked chickpeas, 3 cups water, 1 garlic clove, and salt (optional) to Instant Pot.
Pressure cook on High for 15 minutes. Let pressure release naturally for 10–15 minutes, then manually release the rest.
Drain the chickpeas and reserve 1/2 cup of the cooking liquid.
In a food processor, add the cooked chickpeas, tahini, lemon juice, garlic, cumin, salt, black pepper, olive oil, cayenne, paprika, chopped red chili, and sriracha.
Blend, adding reserved chickpea liquid gradually until smooth and creamy.
Taste and adjust seasoning or spice level as desired.
Let the hummus rest for 30 minutes to allow flavors to meld.
Garnish with olive oil, paprika or chili flakes, and whole chickpeas if desired. Serve with pita, fresh vegetables, or chips.
